bwwExcerpt: There is a shocking moment halfway through “The Mountaintop,” the play starring Samuel L. Jackson and Angela Bassett that imagines the last night that Martin Luther King Jr. is alive. It is a shock that turns this superbly acted, perceptively written drama into a disappointment...Those of us who cannot travel with her all the way with “The Mountaintop” can still be thrilled by the promise of her talent.
